comment.author: 77177272@N00
comment._content: Please Join us as a memorial to those who are suffering still! TWIN TOWERS FALL ( remembering 9/11 ) if you haven't already please Join as a Memorial to all those who have suffered and All that are still suffering ! please share all you have of the twin towers ! this group is a memorial for them and there are no limits as to how many you upload at a time . we just want to see pic's before and after and all that you will share with us . Blessings to you and yours ! you really have some awesome images in your photostream !
